title: A Big Tea Estate (22) For Sale
details:
Well Grown Up Tea Estate Direct Access To The Estate A Small Bungalow And Three Line Rooms With 12 Labours.
17 acres has new tea plantation
05 acres has cinnamon plantation
7500 kg tea leaves per month
300-350 kg cinnamon husk twice a year
02 telephone towers rental money ( around 700000 per year)
1000 mahogani trees
2000 Attonia trees
Good access into the estate from Thawalama town.
A water stream floats top of the mountain to down. It's good drinking water.
Excellent mountain and sky views
